//The Warper to Mall

prontera.gat,160,190,4	script	Mall Warper	902,{
	shop:	warp "quiz_02.gat" ,337,74;
}	

//The Exit to Prontera

quiz_02.gat,335,74,5	script	Exit	902,{
	warp "prontera.gat" ,155,176;
}	

eden,44,73,6	duplicate(Mall Warper)	Mall Warper#1	902
